title: Emerald Zircon Bridal Jhumka - Jadau Kundan Inspired Design
materials: Cultured Pearls. Expertly crafted with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: Elaborate jhumka design inspired by Jadau Kundan craftsmanship. Features a floral motif stud with a vibrant emerald center stone, intricate filigree work connecting to the bell-shaped jhumka. Adorned with sparkling zircon stones and delicate pearl droplets at the base. Modern interpretation of the timeless Temple Jhumka style.
colors: Cream (Pearls). A traditional South Indian color palette symbolizing prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: and other special occasions. Also suitable for festive events like Diwali
description: A stunning fusion of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The high-quality materials and expert Hyderabadi polish ensure lasting beauty and durability. The vibrant emerald and sparkling zircon stones create a captivating sparkle. A timeless piece that will be treasured for generations. Makes a perfect statement piece for any bride or special guest.
